As per Vedic astrology, Yogas form the relationship between a planet, zodiac sign, or house to another in terms of aspects, conjunctions, and placements. In other words, we can say that it is the consideration of the Dashas that
planets form and their directional impacts.
Which planet is generally responsible for any Yoga in astrology?

Usually, the Sun and the Moon are responsible for the Yogas in astrology. Generally, these planets are responsible for
creating great relationships with people and helping the native build up emotional well-being, which strengthens the horoscope of the person in terms of Yoga.
Which is the most powerful Yoga in astrology?

According to astrology, the most powerful Yoga is the Raja Yoga. So, when this Yoga is free from the negative impacts
of the Trika Lords, Lords of the ninth and the tenth house, or Lords of the fourth and the fifth house, it creates auspicious effects in the horoscope of the person.
What is Vidyut Yoga in astrology?

Vidyut means shining, lightning, or glittering. Thus, this Yoga generally bestows auspicious impacts on the life of the natives and lets them shine in terms of gains and profits. This Yoga lets the people stand out amongst the crowd. A Vidyut Yoga in astrology forms when the lord of the 11 house is exalted and conjoins with planet Venus and the two
fall at an angle from the ascendant lord.
